original_text: As soon as Jehu had finished making the burnt offering, he ordered the guards and officers: “Go in and kill them; let no one escape.” So they cut them down with the sword. The guards and officers threw the bodies out and then entered the inner shrine of the temple of Baal.
korean_text: 번제 드리기를 다하매 예후가 호위병과 지휘관들에게 이르되 들어가서 한 사람도 나가지 못하게 하고 죽이라 하매 호위병과 지휘관들이 칼로 그들을 죽여 밖에 던지고

sentences.original_text: As soon as Jehu had finished making the burnt offering
he ordered the guards and officers
So they cut them down with the sword
The guards and officers threw the bodies out
and then entered the inner shrine of the temple of Baal
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나서 바알 성전의 내실에 들어갔다
